rule.assert: UpdateMode for prot. abstract only allowed for Primary Lead Org
MailAbstractTo only allowed for Primary Lead Org
MailAbstractTo required for Primary Lead Org
LeadOrgProtocolID required for Primary Lead Org
Postal address (with country) required for GenericPersonContact
Section801 element is required when FDARegulated is 'Yes'
DelayedPosting element is required when FDARegulated is 'Yes'
StartDate must be earlier than CompletionDate
Status is 'Complete' so completion date type must be 'Actual'
Actual completion date cannot be in the future
Actual start date cannot be in the future
Status is 'Active' so start date type must be 'Actual'
RegulatoryInformation is required when FDAINDInfo is present
